https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jJpWA1G8LNYQ7uAipZ9lmag6JNS.jpg Horror anthology extravaganza loaded with awesome non-stop gore soaked carnage, mega jump scares and terrifying screams from around the world. Feel the fear, as the sheer horror is thrust open your blood soaked eyes and your pulse races realizing your darkest nightmares with only 60 seconds to live! 60 Seconds to Live
